artist: Manufacturer: William Crawford & Sons; Designer: Mabel Lucie Attwell
inscription:
Inscriptions

on bottom, in balck: [(animals flanking coat of arms) / By Appointment / WILLIAM CRAWFORD & SONS / BISCUIT MANUFACTURERS / EDINBURGH LIVERPOOL & LONDON / GREAT BRITAIN]; on front, LLC, in black: [THE LUCIE ATTWELL KIDDIBICS]
object_name: Lucie Attwell's Bicky House still bank
title: Lucie Attwell's Bicky House still bank
